answers.answer: Are you having cramping with the Braxtons?
Hm. I, to be honest, do not think Braxton hicks are normal at 9 weeks. You are not really far enough along for that even with second pregnancy. Talk to your doctor about it. Any spotting?

Did u go to the doctor, what was the answer?i hope all well with you.I had preeclampsia in my first pregnancy as well and emergency c-section36+5.Now second time pregnant 15 weeks, i have some mild cramps like abdominal pain last 3 days time to time.

question: Is it normal with your second child to feel bh so early?? With my daughter i didnt get any until around 20 weeks or so i believe. Maybe even later than that i dont really remember. Im only 9 weeks as of today and i know theyre normal but it feels like its too early for them. Im hydrated and am not too active. What could possibly be bringing them on? I have an appointment on thursday and will be asking my doc as well. Just wanna get some ideas of what it could be
title: 9 weeks and already having braxton hicks
